alert.note: Alert for Concordia (Louisiana) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.headline: Flood Warning issued March 15 at 8:39AM CDT until March 20 at 10:00AM CDT by NWS Jackson
info.description: ...The Flood Warning continues for the following rivers in Louisiana...Mississippi... Mississippi River At Natchez affecting Adams, Wilkinson and Concordia Counties. For the Lower Mississippi River ...including Arkansas City, Greenville, Vicksburg, Natchez...Minor flooding is forecast. ...FLOOD WARNING REMAINS IN EFFECT FROM THIS AFTERNOON TO LATE MONDAY MORNING... * WHAT...Minor flooding is forecast. * WHERE...Mississippi River At Natchez. * WHEN...From this afternoon to late Monday morning. * ADDITIONAL DETAILS... - At 8:00 AM CDT Wednesday the stage was 48.0 feet. - Forecast...The river is expected to rise above flood stage this afternoon to a crest of 48.5 feet early Friday morning. - Flood stage is 48.0 feet. && Fld Observed Forecasts (7 am CDT) Location Stg Stg Day/Time Thu Fri Sat Mississippi River Natchez 48.0 48.0 Wed 8 am CDT 48.3 48.5 48.4 &&
info.instruction: Forecast includes rainfall on the ground and 48 hours of additional rainfall. Turn around, don`t drown when encountering flooded roads. Most flood deaths occur in vehicles. Additional information is available at www.water.weather.gov/ahps2/index.php?wfo=JAN The next statement will be issued this evening at 8:00 PM CDT.
